goals__remit: The Building Societies Association or BSA is the voice for building societies and for some other mutual financial service providers.  Together these organisations serve over 23 million customers across the UK and have total assets of over £396 billion. Including their subsidiaries, they hold residential mortgage balances of over £312 billion - this equates to 23% of all outstanding mortgages in the UK. They also hold over £276 billion of retail deposits - 18% of all such deposits in the UK - including 37% of cash ISA balances. BSA members employ around 40,000 full and part-time staff and operate through 1,550 branches.
